courses.title: Artificial intelligence (AI)
courses.description: Artificial Intelligence (AI) is transforming our daily lives, workplaces, and industries. From virtual assistants to medical diagnoses, AI is everywhere. This section explores AIâ€™s impact, applications, and challenges.

courses.title: Web3
courses.description: Web3 is a new vision for the internet, built on decentralization, blockchain, and user ownership. This section covers how Web3 works, its benefits, and challenges.

courses.title: The future of work
courses.description: The workplace is evolving rapidly due to technology, automation, and the gig economy. This section explores how jobs are changing and what skills will be essential in the future.
